   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1]).
   67: 
   68: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   69: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   70: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   72: 
   73: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   74:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   75:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   76:     )).
   77: 
   78: -record(rsm_in, {
   79:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   80:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   81:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   82:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   83:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   84:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   85:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   86:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   87:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   88:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   89:         }).
   90: 
   91: -record(forwarded_message, {
   92:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
   93:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
   94:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
   95:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
   96:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
   97:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
   98:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
   99:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  100:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  101: }).
  102: 
  103: -record(result_iq, {
  104:     from            :: binary(),
  105:     to              :: binary(),
  106:     id              :: binary(),
  107:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  108:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  109:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  110:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  111: }).
  112: 
  113: -record(error_iq, {
  114:     id              :: binary(),
  115:     type            :: binary(),
  116:     error_type      :: binary(),
  117:     condition       :: binary(),
  118:     text            :: binary()
  119: }).
  120: 
  121: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  122:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  123:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  124:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  125: }).
  126: 
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: %% Suite configuration
  129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  130: 
  131: muc_host() ->
  132:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  133: 
  134: host() ->
  135:     <<"localhost">>.
  136: 
  137: configurations() ->
  138:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  139:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  140: 
  141: odbc_configs(true) ->
  142:     [odbc,
  143:      odbc_async_pool,
  144:      odbc_mnesia,
  145:      odbc_async_cache,
  146:      odbc_cache,
  147:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  148:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  149: odbc_configs(_) ->
  150:     [].
  151: 
  152: riak_configs(true) ->
  153:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  154: riak_configs(_) ->
  155:      [].
  156: 
  157: basic_group_names() ->
  158:     [
  159:     mam,
  160:     mam_purge,
  161:     muc,
  162:     muc_with_pm,
  163:     rsm,
  164:     with_rsm,
  165:     muc_rsm,
  166:     bootstrapped,
  167:     archived,
  168:     policy_violation,
  169:     offline_message
  170:     ].
  171: 
  172: all() ->
  173:     Reasons =
  174:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  175:         false -> [require_odbc];
  176:         true  -> []
  177:     end,
  178:     case Reasons of
  179:         [] ->
  180:             tests();
  181:         [_|_] ->
  182:             {skip, Reasons}
  183:     end.
  184: 
  185: tests() ->
  186:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  187:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  188:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  189: 
  190: groups() ->
  191:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  192:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  193:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  194: 
  195: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  196:     false.
  197: 
  198: 
  199: basic_groups() ->
  200:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  201:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  202:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  203:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  204:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  205:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  206:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  207:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  208:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  209:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  210:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()}].
  211: 
  212: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  213:      [purge_old_single_message,
  214:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  215: 
  216: mam_cases() ->
  217:     [mam_service_discovery,
  218:      simple_archive_request,
  219:      range_archive_request,
  220:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  221:      limit_archive_request,
  222:      prefs_set_request,
  223:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  224:      iq_spoofing
  225:      ].
  226: 
  227: mam_purge_cases() ->
  228:     [purge_single_message,
  229:      purge_multiple_messages].
  230: 
  231: archived_cases() ->
  232:     [archived,
  233:      strip_archived,
  234:      filter_forwarded].
  235: 
  236: policy_violation_cases() ->
  237:     [policy_violation].
  238: 
  239: offline_message_cases() ->
  240:     [offline_message].
  241: 
  242: muc_cases() ->
  243:     [muc_service_discovery,
  244:      muc_archive_request,
  245:      muc_archive_purge,
  246:      muc_multiple_devices,
  247:      muc_private_message,
  248:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  249:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  250:      ].
  251: 
  252: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  253:     rsm_cases().
  254: 
  255: with_rsm_cases() ->
  256:     rsm_cases().
  257: 
  258: rsm_cases() ->
  259:       [pagination_first5,
  260:        pagination_last5,
  261:        pagination_before10,
  262:        pagination_after10,
  263:        pagination_empty_rset,
  264:        %% Border cases
  265:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  266:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  267:        %% Simple cases
  268:        pagination_simple_before10,
  269:        %% opt_count cases
  270:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  271:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  272:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  273:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  274:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  275:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  276:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  277: 
  278: suite() ->
  279:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
  280: 
  281: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  282:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  283:      | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
  284: 
  285: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  286:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  287: 
  288: user_names() ->
  289:     [alice, bob].
  290: 
  291: create_users(Config) ->
  292:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  293: 
  294: delete_users(Config) ->
  295:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  296: 
  297: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  298:    C = configuration(Group),
  299:    B = basic_group(Group),
  300:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  301:         skip ->
  302:             {skip, {init_modules, C, B, ConfigIn}};
  303:         Config0 ->
  304:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  305:                    [Group, C, B]),
  306:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  307:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  308:     end.
  309: 
  310: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  311:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  312:     case C of
  313:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  314:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  315:         _ ->
  316:             Config0
  317:     end.
  318: 
  319: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  320:     delete_users(Config),
  321:     C = configuration(Group),
  322:     B = basic_group(Group),
  323:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  324: 
  325: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  326:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  327: 
  328: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  329:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  330:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  331:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  332:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  333:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  334:     Config;
  335: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  336:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  337:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  338:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  339:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  340:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  341:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  342:     Config;
  343: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  344:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  345:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  346:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  347:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  348:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  349:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  350:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  351:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  352:     Config;
  353: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  354:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  355:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  356:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  357:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  358:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  359:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  360:     Config;
  361: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  362:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  363:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  364:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  365:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  366:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  367:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  368:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  369:     Config;
  370: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  371:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  372:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  373:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  374:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  377:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  378:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  379:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  380:     Config;
  381: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  382:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  383:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  387:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  388:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  389:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  390:     Config;
  391: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  392:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  393:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  398:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  399:     Config;
  400: 
  401: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  402:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  403:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  405:     Config;
  406: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  407:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  408:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  409:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  412:     Config;
  413: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  414:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  415:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  419:     Config;
  420: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  421:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  425:     Config;
  426: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  427:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  432:     Config;
  433: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  440:     Config;
  441: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  447:     Config;
  448: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  454:     Config;
  455: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  460:     Config;
  461: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  466:     Config;
  467: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  473:     Config;
  474: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  478:     Config;
  479: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  485:     Config;
  486: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  491:     Config;
  492: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  498:     Config;
  499: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  500:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  506:     Config;
  507: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  508:     skip;
  509: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  515:     Config.
  516: 
  517: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  518:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  519:     Config.
  520: 
  521: mam_modules() ->
  522:     [mod_mam,
  523:      mod_mam_muc,
  524:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  525:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  526:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  527:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  528:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  529:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  530:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  531:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  532:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  533:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  534:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  535:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  536:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  537:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  538:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  539: 
  540: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  541:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  542:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  543:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  544:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  545: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  546:     Config;
  547: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  548:     Config;
  549: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  550:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  551: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  552:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  553:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  554: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  555:     clean_archives(Config).
  556: 
  557: 
  558: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  559:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  560:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  561:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  562:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  563:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  564:                                        ],
  565:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  566:                  _ ->
  567:                      ConfigIn
  568:              end,
  569:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  570: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  571:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  572: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  573:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  574: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  575:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  576: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  577:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  578: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  579:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  580:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  581: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  582:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  583:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  584: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  585:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  586:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  587: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  588:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  589:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  590: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  591:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  592:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  593: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  594:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  595: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  596:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  597: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  598:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  599: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  600:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  601: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  602:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  603:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  604: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  605:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  606: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  607:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  608: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  609:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  610: 
  611: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  612:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  613:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  614:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  615:         _ ->
  616:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  617:     end.
  618: 
  619: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  620:     destroy_room(Config),
  621:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  622: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  623:     destroy_room(Config),
  624:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  625: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  626:     destroy_room(Config),
  627:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  628: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  629:     destroy_room(Config),
  630:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  631: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  632:     destroy_room(Config),
  633:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  634: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  635:     destroy_room(Config),
  636:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  637: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  638:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  639: 
  640: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  641:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  642:     orelse
  643:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  644:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  645:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  646: 
  647: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  648:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  649: 
  650: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  651:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  652: 
  653: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  654:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  655:         non_existing -> ok;
  656:         false        -> ok;
  657:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  658:     end.
  659: 
  660: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  661:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  662:     ok.
  663: 
  664: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  665:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  666:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  667:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  668:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  669:     Result ->
  670:         Result
  671:     end.
  672: 
  673: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  674:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  675:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  676:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  677: 
  678: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  679: %% Group name helpers
  680: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  681: 
  682: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  683:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  684: 
  685: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  686: configuration(Group) ->
  687:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  688: 
  689: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  690: %% will be tested.
  691: %%
  692: %% Example:
  693: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  694: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  695: %% @end
  696: make_greedy(List) ->
  697:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  698: 
  699: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  700: basic_group(Group) ->
  701:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  702: 
  703: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  704:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  705:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  706:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  707: 
  708: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  709:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  710: 
  711: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  712:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  713:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  714:         true -> PrefixA;
  715:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  716:     end.
  717: 
  718: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  719:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  720: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  721:     Target.
  722: 
  723: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  724:     Tail.
  725: 
  726: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  727: %% Adhoc tests
  728: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  729: 
  730: %% Querying the archive for messages
  731: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  732:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  733:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  734:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  735:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  736:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  737:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  738:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  739:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  740:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  741:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  742:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  743:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  744:         ok
  745:         end,
  746:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  747:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  748:                       ],
  749:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  750:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  751: 
  752: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  753:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  754:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  755:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  756: 
  757:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  758: 
  759:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  760:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  761:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  762:         ok
  763:         end,
  764:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  765: 
  766: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  767:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  768:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  769:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  770: 
  771:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  772: 
  773:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  774:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  775:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  776: 
  777:         ok
  778:         end,
  779:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  780: 
  781: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  782:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  783:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  784:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  785: 
  786:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  787:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  788:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  789: 
  790:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  791:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  792:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  793: 
  794:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  795:         ok
  796:         end,
  797:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  798: 
  799: archived(Config) ->
  800:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  801:         %% Archive must be empty.
  802:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  803:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  804: 
  805:         %% Bob receives a message.
  806:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  807:         try
  808:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  809:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  810:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  811:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  812:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  813: 
  814:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  815: 
  816:         %% Bob calls archive.
  817:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  818:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  819:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  820:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  821:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  822:         ok
  823:         catch Class:Reason ->
  824:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  825:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  826:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  827:         end
  828:         end,
  829:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  830: 
  831: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  832:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  833:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  834:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  835: 
  836:         %% Bob receives a message.
  837:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  838:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  839:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  840:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  841: 
  842:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  843:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  844:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  845:         ok
  846:         end,
  847:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  848: 
  849: strip_archived(Config) ->
  850:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  851:         %% Archive must be empty.
  852:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  853:         escalus:send(Alice,
  854:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  855:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  856:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  857: 
  858:         %% Bob receives a message.
  859:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  860:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  861:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  862:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  863:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  864:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  865: 
  866:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  867: 
  868:         try
  869:         %% Bob calls archive.
  870:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  871:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  872:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  873:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  874:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  875:         ok
  876:         catch Class:Reason ->
  877:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  878:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  879:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  880:         end
  881:         end,
  882:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  883: 
  884: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  885:     %% rot1
  886:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  887:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  888: 
  889: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  890:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  891:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  892:         true ->
  893:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  894:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  895:         false -> ok
  896:     end,
  897:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  898:         true  -> [S];
  899:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  900:     end.
  901: 
  902: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  903:     Respond;
  904: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  905:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  906:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  907:     %% void()
  908: 
  909: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  910: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  911: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  912: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  913: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  914: policy_violation(Config) ->
  915:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  916:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  917:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  918:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  919:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  920:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  921:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  922:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  923:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  924:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  925:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  926:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  927:         try
  928:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
  929:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
  930:             ok
  931:         catch Class:Reason ->
  932:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  933:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
  934:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  935:         end
  936:         end,
  937:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  938: 
  939: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
  940: offline_message(Config) ->
  941:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
  942:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  943:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
  944:         escalus:send(Alice,
  945:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
  946:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  947:         ok
  948:         end,
  949:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
  950: 
  951:     %% Bob logs in
  952:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  953: 
  954:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
  955:     %% will be delivered automatically.
  956: 
  957:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
  958:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
  959: 
  960:     %% Bob checks his archive.
  961:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  962:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
  963:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
  964: 
  965:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  966: 
  967: purge_single_message(Config) ->
  968:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  969:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  970:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  971:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  972:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  973:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
  974:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
  975:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
  976:             %% Waiting for ack.
  977:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
  978:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  979:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  980:             ok
  981:         end,
  982:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  983: 
  984: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
  985:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  986:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  987:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  988:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
  989:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
  990:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  991:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
  992:             %% Delete fifth message.
  993:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
  994:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
  995:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
  996:             %% Waiting for ack.
  997:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
  998:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
  999:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1000:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1001:             ok
 1002:         end,
 1003:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1004: 
 1005: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1006:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1007:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1008:             [begin
 1009:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1010:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1011:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1012:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1013:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1014:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1015:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1016:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1017:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1018:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1019:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1020:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1021:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1022:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1023:             ok
 1024:         end,
 1025:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1026: 
 1027: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1028:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1029:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1030:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1031:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1032:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1033:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1034: 
 1035:         %% Bob received presences.
 1036:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1037: 
 1038:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1039:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1040: 
 1041:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1042: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1043: 
 1044:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1045:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1046:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1047:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1048:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1049:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1050:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1051:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1052:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1053:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1054: 
 1055:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1056: 
 1057:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1058:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1059:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1060:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1061:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1062:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1063:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1064:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1065:         ok
 1066:         end,
 1067:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1068: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1069: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1070:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1071:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1072:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1073:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1074:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1075:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1076: 
 1077:         %% Bob received presences.
 1078:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1079: 
 1080:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1081:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1082: 
 1083:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1084:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1085: 
 1086:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1087:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1088:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1089:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1090:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1091:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1092:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1093:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1094:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1095:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1096:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1097:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1098:         ok
 1099:     end,
 1100:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1101: 
 1102: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1103:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1104:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1105:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1106:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1107:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1108:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1109:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1110:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1111: 
 1112:         %% Alice received presences.
 1113:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1114:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1115: 
 1116:         %% Bob received presences.
 1117:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1118: 
 1119:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1120:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1121: 
 1122:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1123:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1124:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1125: 
 1126:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1127: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1128: 
 1129:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1130:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1131:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1132: 
 1133:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1134:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1135: 
 1136:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1137:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1138:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1139: 
 1140:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1141:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1142:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1143:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1144:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1145:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1146:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1147:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1148:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1149:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1150: 
 1151:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1152: 
 1153:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1154: 
 1155:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1156: 
 1157:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1158:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1159:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1160:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1161:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1162:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1163:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1164:         ok
 1165:         end,
 1166:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1167: 
 1168: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1169:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1170:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1171:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1172:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1173:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1174: 
 1175:         %% Bob received presences.
 1176:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1177: 
 1178:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1179:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1180: 
 1181:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1182:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1183:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1184:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1185: 
 1186:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1187:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1188:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1189: 
 1190:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1191:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1192:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1193:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1194:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1195:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1196: 
 1197:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1198:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1199:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1200:         ok
 1201:         end,
 1202:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1203: 
 1204: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1205: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1206:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1207:         %% Send
 1208:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1209:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1210:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1211:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1212:         %%   </query>
 1213:         %% </iq>
 1214:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1215:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1216:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1217:         ok
 1218:         end,
 1219:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1220: 
 1221: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1222:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1223:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1224:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1225:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1226:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1227:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1228:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1229:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1230:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1231:         %% Send
 1232:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1233:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1234:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1235:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1236:         %%   </query>
 1237:         %% </iq>
 1238:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1239:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1240:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1241:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1242:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1243:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1244:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1245:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1246:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1247:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1248:         ok
 1249:         end,
 1250:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1251: 
 1252: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1253:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1254:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1255:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1256:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1257: 
 1258: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1259: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1260: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1261:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1262:         %% Send
 1263:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1264:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1265:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1266:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1267:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1268:         %%       </set>
 1269:         %%   </query>
 1270:         %% </iq>
 1271:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1272:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1273:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1274:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1275:         ok
 1276:         end,
 1277:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1278: 
 1279: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1280:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1281:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1282:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1283: 
 1284:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1285:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1286:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1287:         end,
 1288:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1289: 
 1290: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1291:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1292:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1293:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1294:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1295:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1296:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1297:         ok
 1298:         end,
 1299:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1300: 
 1301: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1302:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1303:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1304:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1305:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1306:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1307:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1308:         ok
 1309:         end,
 1310:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1311: 
 1312: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1313:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1314:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1315:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1316:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1317:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1318:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1319:         ok
 1320:         end,
 1321:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1322: 
 1323: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1324:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1325:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1326:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1327:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1328:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1329:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1330:         ok
 1331:         end,
 1332:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1333: 
 1334: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1335:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1336:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1337:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1338:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1339:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1340:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1341:         ok
 1342:         end,
 1343:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1344: 
 1345: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1346:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1347:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1348:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1349:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1350:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1351:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1352:         ok
 1353:         end,
 1354:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1355: 
 1356: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1357:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1358:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1359:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1360:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1361:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1362:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1363:         ok
 1364:         end,
 1365:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1366: 
 1367: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1368:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1369:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1370:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1371:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1372:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1373:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1374:         ok
 1375:         end,
 1376:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1377: 
 1378: 
 1379: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1380:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1381:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1382:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1383:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1384:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1385:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1386:         ok
 1387:         end,
 1388:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1389: 
 1390: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1391:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1392:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1393:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1394:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1395:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1396:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1397:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1398:         ok
 1399:         end,
 1400:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1401: 
 1402: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1403:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1404:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1405:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1406:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1407:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1408:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1409:         ok
 1410:         end,
 1411:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1412: 
 1413: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1414: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1415: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1416:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1417:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1418:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1419:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1420:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1421:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1422:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1423:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1424:         ok
 1425:         end,
 1426:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1427: 
 1428: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1429: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1430:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1431:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1432:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1433:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1434:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1435:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1436:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1437:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1438:         ok
 1439:         end,
 1440:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1441: 
 1442: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1443:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1444: 
 1445: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1446:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1447:         true ->
 1448:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1449:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1450:         _ ->
 1451:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1452:     end.
 1453: 
 1454: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1455:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1456:         true ->
 1457:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1458:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1459:         _ ->
 1460:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1461:     end.
 1462: 
 1463: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1464:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1465:         %% Send
 1466:         %%
 1467:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1468:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1469:         %%     <always>
 1470:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1471:         %%     </always>
 1472:         %%     <never>
 1473:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1474:         %%     </never>
 1475:         %%   </prefs>
 1476:         %% </iq>
 1477:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1478:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1479:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1480:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1481: 
 1482:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1483:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1484: 
 1485:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1486:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1487:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1488:         ok
 1489:         end,
 1490:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1491: 
 1492: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1493: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1494: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1495: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1496: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1497:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1498:         %% Send
 1499:         %%
 1500:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1501:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1502:         %%     <always>
 1503:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1504:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1505:         %%     </always>
 1506:         %%   </prefs>
 1507:         %% </iq>
 1508:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1509:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1510:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1511:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1512:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1513: 
 1514:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1515:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1516: 
 1517:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1518:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1519:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1520:         ok
 1521:         end,
 1522:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1523: 
 1524: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1525:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1526:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1527:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1528:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1529:         try
 1530:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1531:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1532:         ok
 1533:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1534:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1535:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1536:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1537:         end
 1538:         end,
 1539:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1540: 
 1541: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1542: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1543:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1544:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1545:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1546:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1547:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1548:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1549:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1550:         ok
 1551:         end,
 1552:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1553: 
 1554: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1555:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1556:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1557:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1558:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1559:         %% when it is not specified.
 1560:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1561:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1562:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1563:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1564:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1565:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1566:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1567:         ok
 1568:         end,
 1569:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1570: 
 1571: result_iq() ->
 1572:     #xmlel{
 1573:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1574:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1575:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1576: 
 1577: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1578: %% Helpers
 1579: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1580: 
 1581: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1582: 
 1583: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1584: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1585: 
 1586: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1587:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1588:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1589:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1590:     }]).
 1591: 
 1592: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1593:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1594:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1595:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1596:        children = skip_undefined([
 1597:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1598:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1599:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1600:     }]).
 1601: 
 1602: 
 1603: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1604:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1605: 
 1606: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1607:     [];
 1608: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1609:     [{K, V}].
 1610: 
 1611: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1612:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1613: 
 1614: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1615:     undefined;
 1616: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1617:     #xmlel{
 1618:         name = <<"start">>,
 1619:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1620: 
 1621: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1622:     undefined;
 1623: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1624:     #xmlel{
 1625:         name = <<"end">>,
 1626:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1627: 
 1628: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1629:     undefined;
 1630: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1631:     #xmlel{
 1632:         name = <<"with">>,
 1633:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1634: 
 1635: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1636: %% a certain query.
 1637: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1638:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1639:                               undefined, undefined,
 1640:                               undefined, undefined).
 1641: 
 1642: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1643:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1644:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1645:                               undefined, undefined).
 1646: 
 1647: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1648:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1649:                               Start, Stop,
 1650:                               undefined, undefined).
 1651: 
 1652: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1653:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1654:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1655: 
 1656: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1657:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1658: 
 1659: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1660:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1661:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1662: 
 1663: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1664:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1665:        name = <<"query">>,
 1666:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1667:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1668:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1669:        children = skip_undefined([
 1670:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1671:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1672:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1673:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1674:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1675:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1676:     }]).
 1677: 
 1678: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1679:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1680: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1681:     [].
 1682: 
 1683: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1684:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1685: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1686:     [].
 1687: 
 1688: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1689:     [];
 1690: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1691:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1692:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1693:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1694:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1695:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1696: 
 1697: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1698:     undefined;
 1699: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1700:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1701:            children = skip_undefined([
 1702:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1703:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1704:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1705: 
 1706: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1707: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1708: 
 1709: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1710:     undefined;
 1711: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1712:     #xmlel{
 1713:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1714:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1715: 
 1716: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1717:     undefined;
 1718: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1719:     #xmlel{
 1720:         name = <<"index">>,
 1721:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1722: 
 1723: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1724:     undefined;
 1725: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1726:     #xmlel{
 1727:         name = <<"max">>,
 1728:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1729: 
 1730: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1731:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1732:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1733:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1734:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1735: 
 1736: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1737:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1738:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1739:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1740: 
 1741: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1742:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1743:     A =:= Raw.
 1744: 
 1745: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1746: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1747: 
 1748: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NewerJIDs) ->
 1749:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1750:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1751:     NewerEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1752:                       children = encode_jids(NewerJIDs)},
 1753:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1754:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1755:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1756:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1757:        children = [AlwaysEl, NewerEl]
 1758:     }]).
 1759: 
 1760: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1761:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1762:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1763:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1764:     }]).
 1765: 
 1766: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1767: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1768:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1769: 
 1770: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1771:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1772: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1773:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1774:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1775: 
 1776: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1777: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1778: 
 1779: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1780:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1781:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1782:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1783:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1784:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1785: 
 1786: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1787:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1788:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1789:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1790:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1791:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1792:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1793: 
 1794: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 1795:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1796:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1797: 
 1798: 
 1799: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1800:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1801:     M#forwarded_message{
 1802:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1803:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1804: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1805:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1806:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1807:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1808:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1809:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1810:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1811:                 M1, Children).
 1812: 
 1813: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1814:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1815:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1816: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1817: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1818:     M.
 1819: 
 1820: %% Num is 1-based.
 1821: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1822:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1823:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1824:     Id.
 1825: 
 1826: 
 1827: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1828: %%
 1829: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1830: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1831: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1832: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1833: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1834: %%     []}]
 1835: %%
 1836: %%
 1837: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1838: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1839: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1840: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1841: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1842: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1843: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1844: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1845: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1846: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1847: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1848: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1849: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1850: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1851: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1852:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1853:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1854:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1855:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1856:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1857:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1858: 
 1859: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1860:                      IQ) ->
 1861:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1862: 
 1863: 
 1864: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1865:                                   children = Children},
 1866:                            IQ) ->
