 1867:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1868: 
 1869: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1870:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1871:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1872:                                IQ) ->
 1873:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1874:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1875:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1876:             end,
 1877:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1878: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1879:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1880:                                IQ) ->
 1881:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1882: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1883:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1884:                                IQ) ->
 1885:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1886: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1887: 
 1888: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1889: 
 1890: 
 1891: 
 1892: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1893:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1894:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1895: 
 1896: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1897:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1898:                            IQ) ->
 1899:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1900:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1901:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1902: 
 1903: 
 1904: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1905:                                         children = Children},
 1906:                                  IQ) ->
 1907:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1908: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1909:                                         children = Children},
 1910:                                  IQ) ->
 1911:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1912: 
 1913: 
 1914: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1915:     [JID || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1916: 
 1917: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1918: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1919: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1920: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1921: %%   </error>
 1922: %% </iq>
 1923: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1924:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1925: 
 1926:     IQ = #error_iq{
 1927:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 1928:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1929:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1930: 
 1931: 
 1932: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 1933:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 1934:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 1935:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1936:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 1937: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 1938:     IQ.
 1939: 
 1940: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 1941:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 1942:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 1943: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 1944:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 1945: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 1946:     IQ.
 1947: 
 1948: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1949: %% Helpers (muc)
 1950: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1951: 
 1952: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 1953:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1954:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1955:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 1956:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 1957:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 1958: 
 1959: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 1960:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 1961:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 1962:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 1963:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 1964:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 1965: 
 1966: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 1967:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 1968:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 1969:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 1970:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 1971: 
 1972: destroy_room(Config) ->
 1973:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 1974:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 1975:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 1976:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 1977:         _ -> ok
 1978:     end.
 1979: 
 1980: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 1981:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 1982:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 1983:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 1984:                    Room, Nick).
 1985: 
 1986: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 1987:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 1988: 
 1989: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 1990:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 1991: 
 1992: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 1993:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 1994: 
 1995: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 1996:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 1997: 
 1998: 
 1999: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2000:     Pid = self(),
 2001:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2002:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2003:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2004:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2005:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2006: 
 2007:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2008:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2009: 
 2010:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2011:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2012:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2013:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2014:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2015:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2016:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2017:         %% Get whole history.
 2018:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2019:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2020:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2021:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2022:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2023:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2024:         ok
 2025:         end,
 2026:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2027:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2028:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2029:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2030: 
 2031:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2032:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2033: 
 2034: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2035:     Pid = self(),
 2036:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2037:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2038:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2039:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2040:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2041:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2042:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2043:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2044:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2045:         %% Get whole history.
 2046:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2047:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2048:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2049:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2050:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2051:         ok
 2052:         end,
 2053:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2054:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2055:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2056:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2057: 
 2058:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2059:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2060: 
 2061: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2062:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2063: 
 2064: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2065:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2066:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2067: 
 2068: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2069:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2070:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2071:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2072:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2073:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2074:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2075:     Config.
 2076: 
 2077: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2078:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2079:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2080:     timer:sleep(500),
 2081:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2082:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2083:     Config.
 2084: 
 2085: serv_users(Config) ->
 2086:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2087:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2088: 
 2089: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2090:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2091:     {Server, Username}.
 2092: 
 2093: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2094: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2095:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2096:        0 -> ok;
 2097:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2098:     end.
 2099: 
 2100: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2101: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2102:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2103:        0 -> ok;
 2104:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2105:     end.
 2106: 
 2107: 
 2108: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2109:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2110: 
 2111: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2112:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2113: 
 2114: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2115:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2116: 
 2117: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2118:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2119: 
 2120: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2121:     %% Do not care
 2122:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2123:     ok.
 2124: 
 2125: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2126:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2127: 
 2128: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2129:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2130:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2131:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2132:     try
 2133:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2134:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2135:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2136:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2137:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2138:         ok
 2139:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2140:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2141:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2142:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2143:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2144:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2145:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2146:     end.
 2147: 
 2148: 
 2149: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2150:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2151:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2152:     try
 2153:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2154:         ok
 2155:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2156:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2157:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2158:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2159:     end.
 2160: 
 2161: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2162:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2163:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2164:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2165:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2166:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2167:     end.
 2168: 
 2169: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2170:     random:seed(now()),
 2171:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2172:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2173:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2174:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2175:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2176:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2177:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2178:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2179:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2180:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2181:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2182: 
 2183: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2184:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2185:         ID1 =< ID2
 2186:     end,
 2187:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2188: 
 2189: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2190:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2191:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2192:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2193:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2194:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2195: 
 2196: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2197:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2198: 
 2199:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2200:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2201: 
 2202: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2203:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2204:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2205:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2206:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2207:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2208:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2209:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2210: 
 2211: random_time() ->
 2212:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2213:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2214:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2215: 
 2216: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2217:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2218:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2219:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2220:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2221: 
 2222: 
 2223: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2224:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2225: 
 2226: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2227:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2228:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2229:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2230:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2231:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2232:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2233: 
 2234: archive_message(Args) ->
 2235:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2236: 
 2237: 
 2238: 
 2239: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2240:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2241: 
 2242:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2243:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2244:     R = room_address(Room),
 2245: 
 2246:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2247:     Host = host(),
 2248:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2249:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2250:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2251:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2252:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2253:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2254:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2255:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2256: 
 2257:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2258: 
 2259:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2260: 
 2261:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2262: 
 2263: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2264:     Host = host(),
 2265:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2266: 
 2267: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2268:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2269:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2270:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2271:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2272: 
 2273: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2274: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2275:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2276:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2277: 
 2278: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2279:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2280: 
 2281: 
 2282: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2283:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2284: 
 2285: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2286:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2287:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2288:         Other ->
 2289:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2290:             false
 2291:     end.
 2292: 
 2293: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2294:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2295:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2296:             true;
 2297:         _ ->
 2298:             false
 2299:     end.
 2300: 
 2301: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2302:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2303: 
 2304: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2305:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2306:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2307:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2308:     Client.
 2309: 
 2310: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2311:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2312:         undefined ->
 2313:             ok;
 2314:         Value ->
 2315:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2316:     end.
